name: Candied Carols
storyline:
Journey to the Land of Sweets, where you'll meet new friends, learn magic, and uncover a political drama between three kingdoms!

On Christmas Eve, you find yourself awoken by a strange noise... a rat chewing on one of your gifts! You chase him out the front door, trying to recover your present, but suddenly find yourself in another world, as if the front door transformed into a magical portal.

Explore this new world and uncover the story woven throughout the land!
